text: @RandPaul Well, if people want to be as stupid as you are, Mr. I Almost Spread the Coronavirus to Everyone in the Senate Because I Had to Swim in the Senate Pool While Waiting for My Test Results, then the government has every right to quarantine idiots who violate the stay-at-home order.
